item.title: 317 delta HELP!
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

client.java:9456: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (jav a.lang.String) talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": " ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Command its-self:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] "+playerName+": ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] "+playerName+": ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner & coder] "+playerName+": ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[co-owner] "+playerName+":"; 
            } 
 if (playerRights == 0) {
            sM("You need to be a ranked to use ::message");
}
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
            }[/code]

Help???
